mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspPromt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PROMT_SN , PROMT_GRP_SN , PROMT_NM , PROMT_DSCR , PROMT_APRV_STAT_CD , PROMT_APRV_DT , PROMT_APRV_REJECT_DT , PROMT_APRV_REJECT_RESN_CONT , PROMT_TP_CD , PROMT_SPRTR_TP_CD , CHRG_MD_ADMIN_ID , DSP_BEG_DT , DSP_END_DT , DSP_YN , DSP_PD_EXPSR_YN , GNB_UPEND_BANNER_EXPSR_YN , SORT_SEQ , SPCIFY_URL_DSP_YN , PROMT_EXPSR_SECT_CD , DSP_GOD_SORT_STDR_CD , PC_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , MOBILE_LIST_EXPSR_CNT_CD , GOD_EVL_EXPSR_SECT_CD , IMG_GOD_EVL_PRIO_EXPSR_YN , PC_GOD_EVL_LIST_QTY , MOBILE_GOD_EVL_LIST_QTY , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM DSP_PROMT WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROMT_SN = #{promtSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteDspPromt Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM DSP_PROMT WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROMT_SN = #{promtSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
